props.Name: Arrows
props.Description: A small quiver of arrows, to be used before bow attacks.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Heavier and less graceful than fletched arrows, bolts have the advantage of sheer killing force on short distances.

props.Name: Heavy Bolts
props.Description: Fearsome missiles that nearly ignore target's armor.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Heavier and less graceful than fletched arrows, bolts have the advantage of sheer killing force on short distances.
Simple but effective, a mace is great for close quarters melees with armored opponents.
Not everyone can swing this one-handed well, but as the dwarves say, there's a hammer for every hand, and a nail for every hammer.
A maul is a fearsome weapon in strong hands, and cruel besides. Bones with break!

Flavor.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Designed for devastating heavy armored ranks and shieldwalls, this weapon requires good judgment for use or a lot of sheer strength. Preferrably both.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: An unnecessarily heavy weapon, it might be worth its weight if you have the strength to swing it. Deep breaths!
Deceptively light, a metal club with a spike can inflict grievous wounds on limbs and head in more ways than a swordsman can think of.
Not the first choice for a serious fighter, a malus can still hurt a great deal, and not only nails.
Provides light where none is at hand. A passable weapon against vermin and path-blocking obstacles made of wood. Careful though - the less durability left, the less illumination granted!

Passives.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: AddProp(Std bools, Spectrum Light);ParamBonus(Light Emission, 25+2*{this_c_durability});Damage on Attack(5+{this_c_durability},Fire);Illumination Spectrum(25+2*{this_c_durability});

props.Name: Orb
props.Description: Provides Essence regeneration based on remaining Durability.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Reduces Action Points cost for spells and allows using Wand Missile ranged attack.

props.Name: Sphere
props.Description: Provides Essence costs reduction based on remaining Durability.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Reduces Action Points cost for spells and allows using Wand Missile ranged attack.
Often used for ceremonies and rituals, dagger is often referred to as the warlock's last resort.
The single most common sword design in the West, relatively cheap and just good enough to be deadly in a strong man's hand.
Weapon of choice among assassins, stiletto is a versatile and stylish weapon that is solid enough for real combat.
A less than reliable weapon, it is small enough however to inflict potentially critical hits into enemy's weak spots.
Weapon of choice amongst thugs, this blade is short enough to conceal yet solid enough to cleave armor.

props.Name: Scimitar
props.Description: Curved and flowing, a scimitar is most favored by pirates for its crookedness.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Though thin and fragile, rapier can be most deadly in the hands of an expert swordsman.
A paradoxical weapon of Shai'Kar warriors that is as long as a greatsword yet as light as a scimitar, it is greatly favored by Blade Masters throughout the world.

props.Weapon_Attacks: Twohanded Sword Swing;Twohanded Sword Thrust;Hilt Smash;Sword-Tip Poke
props.Name: Claymore

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Cross-hilted and longer version of a Great Sword that is favored by human knights for its ability to cleave through multiple unarmored enemies in a wide arc. Most popular among the knights of the Silver Orders but also everywhere in the West.

A well-proportioned blade that is good for anyone and perfect for no one. Weapon of choice among squires and fencing apprentices. Economic reasons often make it the default weapon in large military units.
An apparently unwiedly weapon that turns into a blur of destruction in a Sharadrim's hands.
A more combat-oriented version of dagger that is good to have down your shin if your sword's been knocked off your grip.
An exotic ritual blade from the East that seems can cut as well as stab. Wounds inflicted with a kris seem to be wider, their blood harvest richer.
Weapon of choice amongst pirates, this blade is short enough to conceal yet solid enough to cleave armor.

props.Weapon_Attacks: Twohanded Sword Swing;Twohanded Sword Thrust;Hilt Smash;Sword-Tip Poke
props.Name: Flamberg

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Flame Sword is a relatively novel design, allegedly conceived by dwarves of the Red Blaze clan. Its thrusts are usually lethal as the cuts are almost twice as wide as from an ordinary blade.

Illadrim, the ritual blade of Dark Elf origins is all the more deadly for being unlike any other blade. While it resembles a scimitar, it apparently can be used also as a scythe, dagger or longsword. The glory of the Old WorldASCII_OPEN8217ASCII_CLOSEs craftsmanship!

Quick and nimble, a hand axe is most loved for its throwing qualities and the element of surprise. Besides, it's one of the cheapest instruments of death, used since the age of the Old Gods. Back to the roots, hack away!
Favored by dwarves for its balance and optimal size, the battle axe is your best friend when it comes to a bloody close quarters melee. Chopping it!
Simple and savage, this weapon could well be called a lumber axe... yet one would not be wise to underestimate it.

props.Name: Great Axe
props.Description: Heaviest and deadliest, the Great Axe immediately demands your enemy's respect.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Though somewhat cumbersome, in skilled hands a halbert combines great reach and lethal force. Leveraging its length can give it an even greater force of impact - so it might be a good idea to keep a bit of distance between yourself and your foe!
Highly versatile weapon, a pollaxe is not an easy weapon to craft and balance, but well worth the effort - for then a good man-at-arms can make it sings a song of glorious slaughter.

Quick and nimble, a hand axe is most loved for its throwing qualities and the element of surprise. Besides, it's one of the cheapest instruments of death, used since the age of the Old Gods. Back to the roots, hack away!

A relic from the nigh-forgotten War of Annihilation, this axe had once served a demon lordASCII_OPEN8217ASCII_CLOSEs fury. Even aged now, it is a fearsome weapon of heavy-handed slaughter. It appears to have some sinister link with its wielderASCII_OPEN8217ASCII_CLOSEs own rage...
Cheap and deadly, the spear has been at the tip of mass warfare for as long as it existed.
Some might say this is just a walking stick, but there's metal on it, so it belongs in the weapons shop.
The wielder of a battle staff can strike foes on left and right without the need to turn their in their direction. Still, it's really just a stick with metal weights on each end, plus Zen.
When a scythe enters the battlefield, something has gone terribly wrong in the kingdom.

props.Flavor: Penetrates some of enemy's armor and deals more damage with Counter Attacks.
props.Name: Pike
props.Description: Penetrates some of enemy's armor and deals more damage with Counter Attacks.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Longer and more elaborate than a spear, a lance is favored by mounted knights and those unfortunate footmen who need to fight them.
This one is for cutting off feet from under your foes, if you find yourself facing them with no other weapon somehow.
Cheap and deadly, the spear has been at the tip of mass warfare for as long as it existed.
When a scythe enters the battlefield, something has gone terribly wrong in the kingdom.
Cheap and deadly, the spear has been at the tip of mass warfare for as long as it existed.
